reviewText: I picked this up largely due to youtube videos I had seen of Mihiro and wanting to see a little more. Unfortunately all you do see is a little more. I was hoping to see more than just a topless Mihiro, but alas, you will have to look for that elsewhere. Overall not bad, but not that great either, and the run-time is a rather disappointing 40 minutes (despite being advertised on the ASM website as having a 60 minute runtime). Buy only if you a big fan of Mihiro.
